indicator_name: Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture
target_name: 2030년까지 생산성과 생산량을 증가시키고 생태계 유지에 도움이 되며 기후변화, 기상 이변, 가문, 홍수 및 기타 자연재해에 대한 적응력을 강화하고 토지와 토양의 질을 점진적으로 향상 시킬 수 있는 지속가능한 식량생산체계를 보장하며, 회복력 있는 농업 관행을 이행
page_content: ▶ Data unavailable: There are currently no national statistics (Type 1), international statistics (Type 2), or alternative national statistics (Type 3) available. The Data of Type 1, type 2, or type 3 can be also included in case of temporary unavailability.
title: Proportion of agricultural area under productive and sustainable agriculture
target: By 2030, ensure sustainable food production systems and implement resilient agricultural practices that increase productivity and production, that help maintain ecosystems, that strengthen capacity for adaptation to climate change, extreme weather, drought, flooding and other disasters and that progressively improve land and soil quality
global_metadata_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
